title: CertFID
description: Modern responsive website for RFID certificate verification application.
details:
Project features:

  • Responsive web interface for certificate verification
  • Admin dashboard for managing certificates and credentials
  • Integration with NFC/RFID scanning hardware
  • Secure authentication and verification protocols
  • Real-time status updates and notifications
  • Comprehensive reporting and analytics

Technologies: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, WebAuthn
